data.title: Readoption of the Emergency Regulations for Cannabis Cultivation
data.excerpt: CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing, a division of the California Department of Food and Agriculture, has readopted the emergency regulations for commercial medicinal and adult-use cannabis cultivation.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California Department of Food and Agriculture
